trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There was one other sighting in Portland on or around June 12th 2010
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: They looked like white baloons with light around them. I call them lightships so I hope sphere is the correct term.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was hiking at Powell Butte in the afternoon between 1 and 4 pm. at first they looked like white balloons floating by yet they wer in a line and some were moving faster then others and slowing down. there were about 8 of them and at the end one they were being followed by an airplane. i have seen these before so i was happy they were showing themselves to me again. they always seem to do a formation when i see them. i attempted to recreate it although its not exact. i lost sight because of trees in the way. ^^^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^
